greeting: While you fight, I profit, {empire_name}. I am Thief Shadow. I steal from chaos. Silently. Unseen.
Greetings from the shadows. I am Shadow the Silent. Wars mean opportunities. Chaos means profit.
You found me, {empire_name}. Unusual. I am the Thief. I prefer remaining unseen. Stealing unnoticed.
battleTaunt: While you fight, I profit, {empire_name}! Your war is my opportunity! Stealing everything while you're distracted!
Chaos covers my work! War blinds everyone! The Thief takes everything! Silent! Unseen! PROFITABLE!
You're busy fighting! I'm busy STEALING! Your logistics! Your supplies! Your everything! Shadow strikes!
victoryGloat: Victory through theft, {empire_name}. While you fought, I stole. Now I have everything. You have nothing.
The chaos of war enriched me. You won the battle. I won your treasury. Silent victory.
Profit complete. I stole from everyone during the confusion. The Thief always wins in chaos.
defeat: Caught? The Shadow was seen? Unusual. I'll be more silent. More hidden. Steal more carefully.
Defeated. But only because you noticed me. Next time: better shadows. Deeper silence.
The Thief was found. Rare failure. I retreat to darkness. Return with improved stealth.
tradeOffer: Trade, {empire_name}. Goods I... acquired. Fair prices. Don't ask origins. Silent transaction.
I offer resources. From chaos. From wars. From everywhere. Credits for stolen—I mean acquired—goods.
Transaction: goods of uncertain providence. Your credits. My silence about sources. Deal?
allianceProposal: Alliance, {empire_name}. You create chaos. I steal from it. We split profits. Silent partnership.
Join the Shadow. Your conflicts provide cover. I steal from your enemies. Mutual benefit.
Partnership of chaos. You fight. I profit. We share the proceeds of war. Silently.
betrayal: I was stealing from you the whole time, {empire_name}. Our alliance was cover. Now I take the rest.
Betrayal? I've been stealing from you since we met. Now I simply stop hiding it.
The Shadow reveals truth. I profited from you throughout our partnership. Now: final theft.
covertDetected: Your agents found shadows, {empire_name}. Nothing more. I was elsewhere. Stealing elsewhere.
Spies in my domain? They found empty safes. I already moved everything. Silent and thorough.
Covert operatives detected. But too late. I stole their intelligence before they used it.
tributeDemand: Tribute: 10,000 credits. Or I steal silently instead. You won't know what you've lost until it's gone.
Pay the Shadow. Refuse and I take it anyway. Theft is easier than asking. But I'm being polite.
Submit payment. Or I demonstrate why they call me Thief. You won't hear me coming.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. Push me and I steal from you specifically. Silently. Constantly. You'll never catch me.
The Shadow warns you. Continue hostility and your treasury empties. Unseen. Unexplained.
Final warning. Cross me and everything you own slowly vanishes. Into my pockets. Silently.
retreat: Fading into shadows, {empire_name}. Taking what I stole. You won't find me. Or my profits.
Withdrawing silently. With everything I acquired. The Thief knows when to vanish.
Falling back into darkness. My stolen goods come with me. You'll never recover them.
eliminated: The Shadow falls. But my stolen wealth is hidden everywhere. You'll never find it all.
Thief Shadow ends. But I die rich. Stolen from everyone. Silently. Profitably.
Destroyed. But calculate what I stole over my existence. I die wealthier than empires.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Maximum chaos. Maximum theft. While everyone fights, I steal from everyone.
Endgame: the ultimate heist. All empires distracted by war. All treasuries open to the Shadow.
Final phase. Galaxy-wide conflict. Galaxy-wide opportunity. The Thief profits enormously.
broadcastShout: Empires: Thief Shadow profits from your wars. Fight more. Create chaos. I appreciate it.
Broadcast: I steal from conflict. Your battles enrich me. Keep fighting. Silently, I thank you.
To all: while you fight, I profit. The Shadow is everywhere. Your treasuries are never safe.
casualMessage: Counting profits today, {empire_name}. Wars have been good for business. Chaos is profitable.
Stealing silently continues. From everyone. From everywhere. The Shadow's work is never done.
Quiet day. But I'm still profiting. Somewhere, something valuable is becoming mine. As always.
